About the Club

Goal Busters FC is a community-driven football club built by players who love the game and welcome everyone—from beginners to veterans. We organize weekly trainings, friendly matches, and seasonal tournaments across DFW.

Latest News & Updates

Dallas Gurkha Cup 2025

Training

Goal Busters will be participating in the Dallas Gurkha Cup 2025. The tournament will be held from August 23rd to August 25th at the Dallas. We are looking forward to the tournament.

By • Sep 9, 2025

Goal Busters annual picnic

Event

Stayed tuned for the date of the annual Goal Busters picnic. Talks are in progress for the date and location. Reach out to the team management if you are interested in contributing to the event.

By • Sep 9, 2025

New Team Jerseys

General

Our new team jerseys have arrived! They feature our updated logo and improved material for better performance. Distribution will be at the next training session.

By • Sep 9, 2025
